title: Dazzling Diamond Kada: Modern Glamour with South Indian Roots
materials: Crafted with 18K Yellow Gold. Set with brilliant-cut diamonds
approximately VS clarity. Features a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: This Kada boasts a modern, geometric design with a zig-zag pattern, studded with dazzling diamonds. The open-ended design offers ease of wear and a contemporary flair. It blends the tradition of 'Kada' with a modern aesthetic, ideal for the contemporary South Indian woman.
colors: Warm yellow gold complemented by the sparkling white brilliance of the diamonds.
occasions: or as a stylish addition to any festive occasion. Can also be worn as a statement piece for a Seemantham (బొంతల పండుగ) or half-saree function.
description: This contemporary Kada offers a unique blend of modern design and traditional South Indian jewelry sensibilities. The high-quality diamonds and 18K gold ensure lasting beauty and value. Its versatility allows it to be worn for both casual and formal events, making it a truly investment-worthy piece. The zig-zag pattern is a unique design.
